titles.title: CB 163 When the Lord Turned Again the Captivity of Zion
Psalm 126

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WHEN THE LORD TURNED AGAIN THE
CAPTIVITY OF ZION,
We were like them that dream. Then was our
mouth filled with laughter and our tongue with
singing; then said they among the heathen, the
Lord hath done great things for them.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Lord hath done great things for us, whereof
we are glad. Turn again our captivity, O Lord, as
the streams in the south. They that sow in tears
shall reap in joy.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious
seed, shall doubtless come again, shall doubtless
come again, shall doubtless come again with
rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
